title.narrative: Strengthening the relationship between the labour sector and the democratic movement in Swaziland

description.narrative:
The specific objective of this intervention is to increase the capacity of Global Aktion (GA)’s partner in Swaziland, the Swaziland United Democratic Front (SUDF) in order to facilitate the inclusion of the recently strengthened Trade Union Congress of Swaziland (TUCOSWA) through a new initiative, a Labour Networking Summit (LNS). The LNS will go towards sustainably aligning the political and labour struggles of TUCOSWA and SUDF in the long-term.
All this should re-engage the labour sector and its members and their push for democracy. In this recent fragile opening of political space it is important to keep up the pressure on the regime.

participating-org.narrative: Global Aktion - Mennesker & miljø før profit
